title: Alien
description: Based on a story by O'Bannon and Ronald Shusett, Alien is a story of a spaceship crew that must struggle against a creature known as the Xenomorph for there individual survival.

title: Jurassic Park
description: Jurassic Park is about a select group chosen to tour an island theme park populated by dinosaurs created from prehistoric DNA.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: What an adventure this takes you on! Indiana Jones takes on Nazis in the desert to stop them from finding the Ark of the Covenant.  It is a face-melting good movie.
